name: @eso-status/types
description: Library containing all data types for the @eso-status solution
author: @dov118 <contact@dov118.dev> (https://dov118.dev)

scripts.build:cleanOld: rm -rf lib/* && rm -rf index.d.ts && rm -rf index.js
scripts.build:mergeDTS: cat lib/type/**/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/type/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/const/**/*d.ts >> index.d.ts && cat lib/interface/*d.ts >> index.d.ts
scripts.build:merge: npm run build:mergeDTS && npm run build:mergeJS
scripts.build:momentImport: echo "import { Moment } from 'moment';" >> temp.index.d.ts && grep -v "import " index.d.ts >> temp.index.d.ts && mv temp.index.d.ts index.d.ts
scripts.build:replaceExportDefaultJS: sed -i -e 's/declare const/export declare const/g' index.d.ts && awk '!/export default/' ./index.d.ts > index.temp.d.ts && mv index.temp.d.ts ./index.d.ts && sed -i -e 's/const /exports./g' index.js && awk '!/exports.default/' ./index.js > index.temp.js && mv index.temp.js ./index.js
scripts.build:replaceExportDefaultTs: sed -i -e 's/export interface EsoStatus {/export default interface EsoStatus {/g' index.d.ts
scripts.build:change: npm run build:momentImport && npm run build:cleanJs && npm run build:replaceExportDefaultJS && npm run build:replaceExportDefaultTs
scripts.build: npm run build:cleanOld && npm run build:build && npm run build:merge && npm run build:cleanAfterMerge && npm run build:change && npm run build:cleanTemp
